Title: Recalling the War
Description: Our operations here are secure. For now, anyway! It is time for you to begin your journey to the past so that we may observe how history unfolded. Speak with Eternus if you have any final questions about our mission. She can show you how these events began.
ObjectivesText: Ask Eternus to show you the events of the past.
RewardText: Good luck, $n. We will be watching you.

Objectives.Text: Speak to Eternus about recent events
